credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
title: Chasuble
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread, linen
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on a satin ground
description: Chasuble with a narrow center panel of cut and uncut velvet on a white satin in a large-scale symmetrical floral design. Side panels are red cut and uncut velvet on a satin ground in a large-scale floral and foliate design. Gold ribbon outlines the panels. Lined with linen.
name: Chasuble
